doc.name: element
doc.summary: Used with the repeat control structure to specify that the statements in the repeat loop will be executed once for each element in an array.

examples.example: repeat for each element thisMonth in monthlyReceivables

description.p: Use the element keyword to perform an action on all the elements of an array.
The word after the phrase for each element is a variable name. The value of each element is placed in this variable during that iteration of the repeat loop.

p.code: repeat for each element myElement in myArray
repeat with x = 1 to the number of lines in the keys of myArray
put myArray[line x of the keys of myArray] into myElement

description.p: However, the first form, using the element keyword, is much faster.
